description: Try our easy to follow Christmas Fruit & Nut Slice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Christmas Fruit & Nut Slice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250 g Sunbeam gourmet selection mixed fruit

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon mixture into prepared tin and bake for 40 minutes. Allow to cool. Dust with icing sugar and slice thinly.
